short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MeenyMo is tricky decisions made easy!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MeenyMo brings state-of-the-art technology to decision-making problems of everyday life, for example:
- buying a house
- choosing a flatmate
- buying a car
- deciding where to live
- choosing a surfboard
- selecting players for a team.

Indeed you can use MeenyMo to help you with decisions relating to just about anything where you have more than one option available to you.

You can load up the different alternatives you're choosing between, including links, photos and locations were appropriate, and you can adjust your criteria whenever you like.

Use one of the decision templates to get a head start on creating your decision, or create a new decision from scratch.
